comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: I'd like to come along (I have my bike here and everything), but a 1 PM meeting snuck up on me. Have a nice climb. Kevin

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Sorry I missed you Steve and Noel. I had a meeting that went til noon. When I got to my office I looked out and saw you two just taking off. Had a good ride on my own though. Looking forward to celebrating #600 with Dave next week.
